public void SetJoin(SQLTable joinedTable,
                    java.lang.String joinConditionKey,
                    java.lang.String joinConditionForeignKey)
Create a join to another table.

Parameters:
joinedTable - give the SQLTable-object for the joined table
joinConditionKey - give the column in this table as part of the join-condition
joinConditionForeignKey - give the column in the joined table as part of the join-condition
